contest-event.event-date: Oct. 5, 1963 D National Mineworkers (Fourth Section) National Mineworkers (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-fourth-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Fourth Snowdon Fantasy Winter Gardens (Pavilion Theatre), Blackpool, England, UK 6 bands competed Dec. 10, 2011, 5:12 p.m. Sept. 28, 2016, 10:06 a.m. 1 Grimethorpe Colliery Junior Band Ken Johnson 2 Clock Face and Sutton Manor J. D. Robinson 3 Shotton Colliery Band W. H. Gelson 4 Abertysswg Youth Silver W. T. Davies Unknown Result Dudley Workmens [Northumberland] W. S. Bond Unknown Result Shirland Welfare Band J. Fawbert
